section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: we are supporters of the European Paper Recycling Council (http://www.paperrecovery.org/), of Two Sides (http://www.twosides.info/) and signed up to the interests of the Industry4Europe coalition
goals__remit: To represent the interests of the European envelope manufacturing industry towards the EU institutions and to provide our members with EU and sector related information as well as to provide a platform for exchange on best practice and sector developments.
